notes: cloud?

MIDDLE-CLICK a notebox
to delete it

i don't want to be
a notebox any more
please delete me :(

a new tile type will be
created for each tile
edited in this way

MIDDLE-CLICK an entity
to remove it
a dungeon?

HOLD CTRL while editing
passability to set it on
a individual basis

or hold tab
and click
left/right

HOLD ALT and LEFT-CLICK
to select the colour
under the cursor

SHIFT+LEFT-CLICK to make
a tile type impassable

press T to create a
blank entity under
the cursor
sand?
it looks like a grid of squares

press ESCAPE or CLICK
somewhere else to stop
editing a notebox
select a tile from the tileset
hell?

press 1 / 2 / 3 to
change the size of
the drawing brush
select the "place tiles" tool
make maps

try editing the tiles so
that one is a wall and the
other is a floor
chaos dimension?
make graphics
a work in progress

place and delete tiles to
make the map interesting
no stencil

map squares that are of an
impassable type are green
if you set them passable
MIDDLE-CLICK to erase a tile
select the "annotate project" tool
welcome to kooltool
a dream?
select the "edit pixels" tool
zoom
make notes
a cave?
mountains?
maybe a castle?

HOLD LEFT-CLICK and move
the mouse around to draw
grass?

try making a few creatures
to put in this area
pavement?

you can also use
the arrow keys

you can drag entities around
when you are not using the
"edit pixels" tool

HOLD LEFT-CLICK and move
the mouse over the tiles
to draw

erase this man and
draw a dog instead

hold "alt" and left-click a tile
on the map to select that type
of tile
clone
press CTRL+S to save

press SPACE to select a
random colour to draw in

you can use the stencil to
avoid cloning too many tiles
report bugs to ragzouken@gmail.com

SHIFT+MIDDLE-CLICK to make
a tile type passable again

LEFT-CLICK on a notebox
to start typing into it

tell me your name:
is this a house?

try using CTRL to make some
corners for the walls
make a game
heaven?
pan
it looks like a flashing marker pen
hedge?

HOLD CTRL at the same
time to erase instead
LEFT-CLICK to place a tile

HOLD CTRL when drawing to
paint tiles individually
without affecting other
copies

drawing that starts on an entity
only affects that entity

press CTRL+SHIFT+S to export your game
to playable desktop versions
by mark wonnacott

>>> this is a notebox <<<

drag it around by HOLDing
LEFT-CLICK over it and
moving the mouse

press Y to make your
own notebox
it looks like a coloured pencil
stencil

HOLD SHIFT while drawing on an
entity to resize it as you draw

HOLD SHIFT to see and edit
passability of the tiles
and map squares
no clone

press and HOLD SHIFT on
a tile to stencil drawing
and keep within the edges
wall?
